item.title: [help] Error Connecting to server (other Comps) [PI]
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

ok so pretty much it works for me but not for other players. in the RUN for the client in the cmd an error pops up saying something cannot be found. its in this code below:

This is the Client.java code

if(abyte0 == null) { drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server..."); new Update("http://cruelalityx.com/webclient/CruelalityX.zip", "CruelalityX.zip", signlink.findcachedir()); abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); }

and heres the cachedownloader.java

if(abyte0 == null) { drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server..."); new Update("http://cruelalityx.com/webclient/CruelalityX.zip", "CruelalityX.zip", signlink.findcachedir()); abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); }
it works for the computer that runs the source but not the computer that dosnt have it.

i realize i must change the cache link… but isn’t there a cache already in there?

Read full topic
